availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William McDaniel (Clay County farmer and soldier)

body.p: Clay County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Jane Gibson in Clay County, Kentucky, on August 23, 1860. Farmer in Clay County in 1850. Farmer in Clay County in 1860. Served in the 8th Kentucky Infantry (U.S.A.) as captain from November 13, 1861 to February 25, 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Clay County, Kentucky District, p. 133A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Clay County, Sextons Creek, p. 98.
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 0224.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Clay County Marriages, Film# 662, p. 66.
